issue.title: Mersenne twister meaningless for word sizes less than two

discussion.p: The Mersenne twister algorithm is meaningless for word sizes less than two, as there are then insufficient bits available to be “twisted”.

blockquote.p: Insert the following among the relations that are required to hold: 2u < w.

discussion.note: 2010 Batavia: The working group concurred with the issue's Proposed Resolution

blockquote.p: 4 The following relations shall hold: 0 < m, m <= n, 2u < w, r <= w, u <= w, s <= w, t <= w, l <= w, w <= numeric_limits<UIntType>::digits, a <= (1u<<w) - 1u, b <= (1u<<w) - 1u, c <= (1u<<w) - 1u, d <= (1u<<w) - 1u, and f <= (1u<<w) - 1u.
